summary: A brilliant student starts hallucinating after moving into a room that was occupied by another who committed suicide.
cast: Sara Arjun|Rajvvir Aroraa|Aditya Banerjee|Mukesh Bhatt|Amod Burande|Tisca Chopra|Chandra Shekhar Dutta|Nishikant Kamat|Satish Kaushik|Lawrence Postma|Prabhat Raghunandan|Ruchir Raj|Vinod Rawat|Imaaduddin Shah|Vinay Sharma|Ritika Silas|Meenakshi Thapa
title: 404: Error Not Found
